content: 教育科学出版社学习要点 . - Where did you live in Canada? - I lived in Ottawa. . - Isn’t Ottawa in the west? - No, it’s in the east. . - What’s your favorite subject? - My favorite subject is P.E. . - Which do you like better, the purple one or the blue one? - I like the purple one better. . - Do you have a bigger one? - Sure! This is the biggest one. . - How can I get to the fun park? - Go down this street and turn right. It will be on your left. . - What should we do first? - We should park our bikes. . - How tall are you? - I’m 150 cm tall. I’m taller than you are. . I want to ride the roller coaster. I’m tall enough. . - Shall we go to the safari park? - Yes, I’m interested in jungle life. . - I can’t find my brother. - We’ve got to call the police. . - What does your brother look like? - He has big blue eyes. . - Is Qiaoqiao as tall as you? - No, he’s shorter than I am. He’s as tall as that clown. Going to School New
